articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of High School Principals of Chongryon
SPA Chairman Meets German Lawmaker and His Party
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of High School Principals of Chongryon 
   Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and talked in a compatriotic atmosphere with the delegation of high school principals of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) headed by Jo Han Ju, chief inspector of the educational department of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Reception Given by Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
SPA Chairman Meets German Lawmaker and His Party 
   Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with Johannes Plug, member of the Federal Assembly from the Social-Democratic Party of Germany, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
